A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For me\, easily\,30 minutes too long. I feel bad saying this but Carrie Fischer was bad in this episode and unnecessary. To date the new versions have never touched the originals. Mainly\, because I loved the original cast in their heyday and the movie was so fresh and unique. I do like the new cast members so\, cut the chord with the way past prime\, leftover old cast! I'll keep going but looking forward to no more old cast and hopefully\, way better\, editing!
